product_no,
borrow_no,

trade_no_ups,
type,

gmt_plan_repayment,
gmt_arrival,
finish_date,
remark,

gmt_modified,
borrow_remark,
repay_remark,

mapper.update:
UPDATE jsd_borrow_cash
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_no = #{productNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrow_no = #{borrowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_no_xgxy = #{tradeNoXgxy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_no_ups = #{tradeNoUps,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
review_status = #{reviewStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
review_remark = #{reviewRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
arrival_amount = #{arrivalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
card_number = #{cardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_name = #{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
overdue_status = #{overdueStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
overdue_day = #{overdueDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
overdue_amount = #{overdueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
poundage_amount = #{poundageAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
interest_amount = #{interestAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repay_principle = #{repayPrinciple,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
repay_amount = #{repayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sum_repaid_interest = #{sumRepaidInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sum_repaid_poundage = #{sumRepaidPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sum_repaid_overdue = #{sumRepaidOverdue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
renewal_num = #{renewalNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
interest_rate = #{interestRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
poundage_rate = #{poundageRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
overdue_rate = #{overdueRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
risk_daily_rate = #{riskDailyRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
gmt_plan_repayment = #{gmtPlanRepayment,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_arrival = #{gmtArrival,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
finish_date = #{finishDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrow_remark = #{borrowRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
repay_remark = #{repayRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_close = #{gmtClose,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = NOW()
WHERE is_delete = 0 AND id = #{rid ,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE is_delete = 0 AND id=#{rid ,jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE is_delete = 0 AND borrow_no=#{borrowNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT
FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE is_delete = 0 AND trade_no_xgxy=#{tradeNoXgxy} LIMIT 1
select borrow_no from jsd_borrow_cash WHERE borrow_no LIKE CONCAT(#{orderNoPre},"%") ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT count(*) FROM jsd_borrow_cash b where b.is_delete=0 and b.gmt_plan_repayment < #{nowTime} and status ='TRANSFERRED'
SELECT count(*) FROM jsd_borrow_cash b where b.is_delete=0 and b.gmt_plan_repayment < #{todayLast} and status ='TRANSFERRED'

SELECT
FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE is_delete = 0 AND user_id = #{userId} and status not in ('CLOSED','FINISHED','TRANSEDFAIL');

SELECT
FROM jsd_borrow_cash b where b.is_delete=0 and status ='TRANSFERRED' and b.gmt_plan_repayment < #{nowTime} and user_id in (${userIds})

SELECT a.*,b.mobile,b.real_name FROM jsd_borrow_cash a inner join jsd_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.is_delete=0
AND a.review_status ='WAIT'
AND a.review_status ='PASS'
AND a.review_status ='REFUSE'
AND a.trade_no_xgxy LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') AND b.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') AND b.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%')

SELECT COUNT(review_status='WAIT' or NULL) as wait,COUNT(review_status !='WAIT' or NULL) as review,COUNT(review_status ='PASS' or NULL) as pass FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE to_days(gmt_create) = to_days(now())
SELECT SUM(amount) AS amount, COUNT(1) AS apply FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE to_days(gmt_create) = to_days(now())

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE `status` = 'FINISHED' AND to_days(finish_date) = to_days(now()) ) AS repay, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM jsd_borrow_cash WHERE `status` = 'TRANSFERRED' ) AS awaitRepay

SELECT a.*,b.mobile,b.real_name FROM jsd_borrow_cash a inner join jsd_user b on a.user_id=b.id where a.is_delete=0
AND a.status =#{status}
AND a.overdue_status='Y'
AND a.borrow_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') AND b.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%')
